section.name: The Basic Operations
section.p: When you have create a new Persistence Manager in your application, you can use this component to insert, update, delete and retrieve objects. The class 'Folder' used in the following sections should be associated to a class-descriptor defined in the mapping descriptor.
This page describes only the main Persistence Manager methods. You can see the javadoc to get more information on the API.

subsection.name: Save last changes
subsection.p: After some inserts, deletes and/or updates, you can call the method persistenceManager.save() to apply your changes into the JCR repository.
